title: Youtube slow only on firefox
content:
YouTube all of a sudden started to slow down and only be able to load videos fast enough in 360p resolution, I tried watching YouTube on Microsoft edge and YouTube handled 1080p easily there, I have cleared the cash and made sure my Firefox and Windows are up to date and still the issue persists.

this only seams to occur on YouTube as amazon prime and speed test works without issues
creator: nadum8

title: Bookmark Editor
content:
Looking for a bookmark editor that has a search and replace function. Or, is it possible to export bookmarks to a text file to edit, then import text file back to Firefox?

Thanks

content: I want my bookmark toolbar on the left like it was. Not on top. I DO NOT LIKE THIS currant updaet!!!!!
creator: cashier2178

title: Just got FireFox. Need help knowing if its using too much memory.
content: Just downloaded Firefox a day ago; since a friend told me that its better than Edge. It seemed fine at first and then went and looked at task manager. It's using way more memory than Edge. Firefox has 19 separate tasks running totaling to ~1,500 MB. I need to know what I can do to lower it. My friend made it sound like Firefox was way less memory intensive. I don't even keep 10 tabs open at a time. Any help would be appreciated.
creator: CubanCrocodylus

title: updates to website not showing on firefox
content: when I update my website, the updates don't show when I use firefox although my husband who uses Edge, sees the updates. Is it a case of clearing the cache? How do I do that?
creator: kehaujackson

title: Website opens for a moment then goes blank
content:
I open a website (opentable.com) and it opens momentarily then the screen goes blank white. I can open the site using microsoft edge.

Something has changed as this previously was not a problem

title: firefox won't open unless i am running as administrator
content: For some reason Firefox stop working about a week ago and i can get to work again. I can only open it as administrator but when it opens I cant do anything. I have tried all the fixes in the forum and nothing plus reinstalling it several times. I looked into the console and a whole bunch of errors showed up. can anybody help me?
